transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CashTransaction
CashTransaction derive(CT_DTS = toString(byName('_col0_')),
		CT_AMT = toString(byName('_col1_')),
		CT_NAME = toString(byName('_col2_'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 select(mapColumn(
		CT_CA_ID = Column_1,
		CT_DTS,
		CT_AMT,
		CT_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CashFactBalances
